section.title: Windows
section.simpara: You can install either (a) install binaries for both vagrant and virtualbox or (b) you can get them via the chocolatey/nuget package manager.

listitem.simpara: Download the Oracle virtualbox installer from the Virtualbox website
Download the vagrant installer from the VagrantUp website
Install virtualbox first, then install vagrant. Install both software the way you would install any other software Windows. Double click the installer and follow the installation wizards
